message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product. It's a unique opportunity to acquire a high-value item that will bring significant benefits to your business. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I understand you're interested in staying within your budget, but I have to consider my own costs and goals. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer the product to you for $11000. This is a fair price that should work for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $9500 for the product. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
